SvsStamper¶

class placer.SvsStamper(domain, xoffset, treelist)[source]¶

Bases: placer.Extender

extend()[source]¶

Calls methods from ‘Extender’ inheirited class to build domain

Returns:tree placement tiles
Return type:dictionary of lists of 2-tuple coordinates
place_trees(rand_seed=None)[source]¶

Places treelist though the extented domain. Trees are placed by repeated the SVS square. Use the rand_seed parameter for reproducible simulations

Parameters:rand_seed (integer) – sets a random seed to reproducible runs
trim_trees()[source]¶

Trims the trees to the specified domain extent

write_trees(save_to)[source]¶
Parameters:fname –
Returns:
